caption.p: Adenovirus-vectored influenza vaccine induces a balanced Th1/Th2 antibody response against the HA stalk. Balb/c mice were intranasallyimmunized with formaldehyde-inactivated PR8+CT (FiPR8+CT), live PR8 (H1N1), TIV, FluMist ®, rAdH5/M2e. The levels of serum hemagglutinin (HA) stalk-specific total immunoglobulin (Ig), IgG, IgG1, IgG2A, IgG2B, and IgA Abs were measured 28 days post-immunization by ELISA with baculovirus-expressed cH9/1 protein ( A– F). The values represent the mean ± SEM (vertical bars) end point ELISA Ab titers determined from five mice per group (*** p < 0.0001).
